author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx) from 2.0.1 to 2.1.1.
Release notes *Sourced from [Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility's releases](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/releases).* > ## .NET Core 2.1.1 > - [Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/2.1.1.md) > - [Download and Install](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/download-archives/2.1.1-download.md) > > ## Repos > - [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/releases/tag/v2.1.1) > - [CoreFX](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/releases/tag/v2.1.1) > - [Core-Setup](https://github.com/dotnet/core-setup/releases/tag/v2.1.1) > - [CLI](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/releases/tag/v2.1.301) > - [ASP](https://github.com/aspnet/home/releases/tag/2.1.1) > > ## .NET Core 2.1 > - [Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/2.1.0.md) > - [Known Issues](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/2.1.0-known-issues.md) > - [Download and Install](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/download-archives/2.1.0-download.md) > > ## Repos > - [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/releases/tag/v2.1.0) > - [CoreFX](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/releases/tag/v2.1.0) > - [Core-Setup](https://github.com/dotnet/core-setup/releases/tag/v2.1.0) > - [CLI](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/releases/tag/v2.1.300) > > ## .NET Core 2.1.0-preview2-26406-04 > - [Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/Preview/2.1.0-preview2.md) > - [Known Issues](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/Preview/2.1.0-preview2-known-issues.md) > - [Download and Install](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/download-archives/2.1.0-preview2-download.md) > > ## Repos > - [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/releases/tag/v2.1-preview2) > - [CoreFX](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/releases/tag/v2.1-preview2) > - [Core-Setup](https://github.com/dotnet/core-setup/releases/tag/v2.1-preview2) > > ## .NET Core 2.1.0-preview1-26216-03 > > - [Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/2.1.0-preview1.md) > - [Download and Install](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/download-archives/2.1.0-preview1-download.md) > > ## Repos > - [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/releases/tag/v2.1-preview1) > - [CoreFX](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/releases/tag/v2.1-preview1) > - [Core-Setup](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/releases/tag/v2.1-preview1) > > ## .NET Core 2.0.7 > The March Update includes .NET Core 2.0.7 and the .NET Core SDK 2.1.105 > > - [Release Notes](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.0/2.0.7.md) > - [Download and Install](https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/download-archives/2.0.7-download.md) > > ## Repos > - [CoreCLR](https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/releases/tag/v2.0.7) > ... (truncated)
Commits - [`7ee8459`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/7ee84596d92e178bce54c986df31ccc52479e772) Update harvestPackages.depproj to latest stable ([#30172](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/30172)) - [`f69137f`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/f69137f7a79ffd7c191b0421a23a76aea91c668e) Add packages to packages.builds & mark non-stable for 2.1.1 ([#30055](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/30055)) - [`93055b1`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/93055b13249da58e01ea19f91211b8659d3ad178) Removing uapVNext assets from individual packages ([#29970](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29970)) - [`330eae5`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/330eae58750c5fb4c91fa9026ff172aa705c4f70) Remove Xamarin placeholder for System.Memory package ([#29925](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29925)) - [`c3bfa0d`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/c3bfa0df8210f1ddebaf4799448b80fb81b47d20) Add Xamarin placeholder in System.threading.Tasks.Extensions packages ([#29922](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29922)) - [`fe653a0`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/fe653a068c282786766eaffeabdb061946fe3351) check SwitchingProtocol before ContentLength ([#29948](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29948)) ([#29993](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29993)) - [`f11f3e1`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/f11f3e1fcf2dc503a784be2637621d2a3fc25180) Fix handling of cursor position when other ESC sequences already in stdin ([#2](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/2)... - [`d5701d0`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/d5701d0b95ef39d45a01d4e2bd45560afba02fad) disable test one by one ([#29991](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29991)) - [`77a4a19`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/77a4a196225f565ce39abb4f377ae514c695669c) [release/2.1] Port nano test fixes ([#29995](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29995)) - [`7ce9270`](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/commit/7ce9270ac70a2deb009ed4b8d82fe1ebabc597df) Fix Sockets hang caused by concurrent Socket disposal ([#29786](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29786)) ([#29846](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29846)) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/compare/v2.0.1...v2.1.1)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.1&new-version=2.1.1)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.1&new-version=2.1.1) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Build(deps): Bump Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility from 2.0.1 to 2.1.1
